LOGIN.WELCOME: We're happy to annouce that we're getting married and we want you to celebrate with us!
LOGIN.ERROR: The code typed is not correct!

INVITE.HAPPY: We're happy to invite you to our wedding!
INVITE.DETAILS: The wedding will take place at 15:00 16th July 2023 in Oczyszczalnia Miejsce near Warsaw.
INVITE.NOGIFTS: We don't expect any gifts from you, just your presence!
INVITE.HOWEVER: But if you want to give us something, please give us something easily transportable like money. Or animal food which we will happily donate to animal shelter.

MENU.TITLE: Menu
MENU.WODKA: Drinks and wodka are available in the bar.

PICTURES.TITLE: Pictures
PICTURES.AVAILABLE: Pictures from the wedding will be available here.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contacts
CONTACT.TEXT: In case you have any questions please ask us through WhatsApp, SMS, email or the form bellow.
